articles.author: Joe Davies
articles.title: Covid testing providers are charging 20 TIMES the 'fair price' of PCR swabs - Daily Mail
articles.description: A price in the region of £20 would be a reasonable price for the tests, according to Professor Stephen Bustin, a professor of molecular medicine at Anglia Ruskin University.
articles.content:
British holidaymakers could be paying 20 times more than the 'fair' price for PCR Covid tests, a top scientist has claimed.
